page.title: 06CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: In this day and age every child has a different game to play.At break times children play games like ,'tin soldiers','british bulldog',football and 'throw ball'. The games which are quite popular are ball-games and 'tin-soldiers' ,cricket was played but has now been banned. {Tin-soldiers} ============= This is a game where people stand up against the wall and they have to dodge a ball which is thrown at them by another person, if you a hit you throw the ball. {Bulldog} ======== This is a game where everyone is on one side of the yard and one person is in the middle.If you are hit you go in the middle.
